required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of S-1 Plus Oxaliplatin in First-line Treatment of Ederly Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of S-1 Plus Oxaliplatin in First-line Treatment of Ederly Patients With Advanced or Recurrent Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Elderly patients have poor tolerance and physical condition, we will prove 2-week schedule of oxaliplatin plus S-1 have a good efficacy and a better safety for elderly patients with advanced or recurrent gastric cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: 3-week plan of S-1 plus Oxaliplatin has been widely used,but it also has cumulative toxicity.Meanwhile elderly patients have poor tolerance and physical condition, we will prove 2-weeks schedule of oxaliplatin plus S-1 have a good efficacy and a better safety for elderly patients with advanced or recurrent gastric cancer.Untreated elderly patients with advanced or recurrent gastric cancer will receive Oxaliplatin 85 mg/m2 (D1, q2w) and S-1(40mg BID for body surface area < 1.25 m2; 50mg BID for body surface area of 1.25-1.5m2; and 60mg BID for body surface area >1.5 m2; D1-10, q2w) as the first-line treatment. We will investigate the efficacy and safety of the combination treatment, and expect to provide a good effective treatment plan and a better safety for elderly patients with advanced or recurrent gastric cancer in China.The primary endpoint is progression-free survival(PFS), and the secondary endpoints are objective response rate(ORR), overall survival(OS) and the safety.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single Group Assignment Eledrly Patients with Untreated Advanced or Recurrent Gastric Cancer

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

arm_group.description: Oxaliplatin 85 mg/m2 (D1, q2w) and S-1 (40mg BID for body surface area < 1.25 m2; 50mg BID for body surface area of 1.25-1.5 m2; and 60mg BID for body surface area >1.5 m2; D1-10, q2w)

intervention.description: Oxaliplatin 85 mg/m2 (D1, q2w) and S-1 (40mg BID for body surface area < 1.25 m2; 50mg BID for body surface area of 1.25-1.5 m2; and 60mg BID for body surface area >1.5 m2; D1-10, q2w)

overall_official.affiliation: National Cancer Center/Cancer Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences and Peking Union Medical College

facility.name: National Cancer Center/Cancer Hospital, Chinese ACademy of Medical Sciences and Peking Union Medical College
